name: phonoChat

scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install" "cd static_server && npm instal"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd server && PORT=3001 yarn start" "cd static_server && PORT=3002 npm run start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd server && npm run start:prod" "cd static_server && npm run start"

description:
In this project I have been experimenting making a real-time chat application bassed on Socket.io, React and Express. All data is persisted to a MongoDB database.
In the future I will explore user authentication, most likley using Passport.
